TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed AllowedMemberLocations extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the syntax restrictions enforced on a property when it is set in XAML, as reported by a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks Information reported by this property does not account for any possible markup extensions. Markup extensions are processed first and can potentially return objects from within an attribute usage, even for properties that are notated as MemberElement only.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations Any = int32(3)

Docs.summary: Property can be set in either Attribute or MemberElement location. (This enumeration member is defined as the combination of those values.)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations Attribute = int32(1)

Docs.summary: Property can be set in XAML attribute syntax.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations MemberElement = int32(2)

Docs.summary: Property can be set in XAML property element syntax.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Xaml.Schema.AllowedMemberLocations None = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Property cannot be set in XAML at all. This is the default.
